name: Kingsbowl III
description:
Take part in the Kingsbowl, a grand tournament where medieval knights participate in an event not unlike modern (American) football. 

Each player controls a knight on the battlefield, and will need to use their medieval weaponry to tackle opponents (by stabbing them), block enemies from charging their teammates (by using their shield), and pass the "ball" to their allies (by shooting them with a bow and arrow).

Kingsbowl III is a turn-based take on Kingsbowl II
